## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.SET\_OPACITY" property

Emitted when the opacity of the entity is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.SET_OPACITY]: {
        entity: Entity;
        opacity: number;
    };
```
